decision_conditions: Condition : 1 - The development hereby permitted shall be begun before the expiration of three years from the date of this permission.

Condition : 2 - The proposed development shall be carried out in all respects in accordance with the proposals contained in the application and the plans submitted (B3735-02 Rev A, dated OCT 13, received 06/12/2013) therewith and approved by the Local Planning Authority, or as shall have been otherwise agreed in writing by the Local Planning Authority before the building is used.
Condition : 3 - The materials to be used in the construction of the external surfaces of the extensions hereby permitted shall match those used in the existing building.

Condition : 4 - The side dormer window hereby approved shall be finished in obscure glazing and fixed shut below a level of 1.7 metres above internal finished floor level before the development hereby approved is first occupied. These arrangements shall be permanently retained.

Condition : 5 - No additional windows or other glazed openings shall be formed in the side walls of the extensions hereby approved and no additional doors inserted in the building without the prior written consent of the Local Planning Authority.
description: Erection of side and rear roof extensions with front roof windows and a single stroey rear extension to the house
